The misc module¶

The misc module contains commonly used functions

misc.skewnormal(x, loc, scale, shape, amplitude, baseline)¶

skewnormal distribution <https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Skew_normal_distribution/>

Parameters:
  • x – variable
  • loc – location parameter, mean
  • scale – scale parameter, variance
  • shape – shape parameter, skew
  • amplitude –
  • baseline –
Returns:
